org.raistlic.common.assertion

Interface Assertion<C,E extends Assertion<C,E>>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - the actual candidate type.
    E - the actual Assertion sub-type.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BooleanAssertion, CollectionAssertion<E>, GenericAssertion<C>, NumberAssertion<N>, StringAssertion
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericAssertionAbstract

    public interface Assertion<C,E extends Assertion<C,E>>
    Defines some generic useful assertions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      E isEqualTo(C target)
      The method claims that the candidate should be equal to the target, otherwise a runtime exception will be thrown.
      E isEqualTo(C target, java.lang.String message)
      The method claims that the candidate should be equal to the target, otherwise a runtime exception with the specified message will be thrown.
      E isInstanceOf(java.lang.Class<?> type)
      The method claims that the candidate should be an instance of the specified type , otherwise a runtime exception will be thrown.
      E isInstanceOf(java.lang.Class<?> type, java.lang.String message)
      The method claims that the candidate should be an instance of the specified type , otherwise a runtime exception with the specified message will be thrown.
      E isNotEqualTo(C target)
      The method claims that the candidate should NOT be equal to the target, otherwise a runtime exception will be thrown.
      E isNotEqualTo(C target, java.lang.String message)
      The method claims that the candidate should NOT be equal to the target, otherwise a runtime exception with the specified message will be thrown.
      E isNotNull()
      The method claims that the candidate should not be null, otherwise a runtime exception will be thrown.
      E isNotNull(java.lang.String message)
      The method claims that the candidate should not be null, otherwise a runtime exception with the specified message will be thrown.
      E isNull()
      The method claims that the candidate should be null, otherwise a runtime exception will be thrown.
      E isNull(java.lang.String message)
      The method claims that the candidate should be null, otherwise a runtime exception with the specified message will be thrown.
      E matches(java.util.function.Predicate<? super C> predicate)
      The methods claims that the candidate should match the specified predicate , otherwise a runtime exception will be thrown.
      E matches(java.util.function.Predicate<? super C> predicate, java.lang.String message)
      The methods claims that the candidate should match the specified predicate , otherwise a runtime exception with the message will be thrown.

      • isNull

        E isNull()
        The method claims that the candidate should be null, otherwise a runtime exception will be thrown.
        Returns:
        the expectation instance itself, for method calling chain.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - the exception of a specific type, depending on the context where the expectation is used.
